activities:
KickApps is a white label provider of "community software" on the internet.
When users join communities that we power, we may collect Personal Data and other information from them, as further described below:
We collect Personal Data from users when they voluntarily choose to provide such information such as when they contact us with inquiries, respond to one of our surveys, register for access to the Services or use certain Services. Wherever we collect Personal Data we make an effort to provide a link to this Privacy Policy. By voluntarily providing us with Personal Data, users are consenting to our use of it in accordance with our Privacy Policy. If users provide Personal Data to this Site, they acknowledge and agree that such Personal Data may be transferred from their current location to offices and servers of our Service Provider, its affiliates and their contractors located in the United States and other countries.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
